attributes.action: give the people of Great Britain and Northern Ireland their wish to democratically elect their Prime Minister by calling an immediate General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are going into a period of uncertainty and difficulty where the person at the head of our Government must command the respect of the majority of the British people.

Having no confidence in this present Government, led by an unelected Prime Minister who was imposed upon us, this is detrimental to our future. We call for a General Election to be held by Spring 2009.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
